pageContext.claim: “For years, Google promoted President Obama's State of the Union on its homepage. When President Trump took office, Google stopped.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump posted a video that purported to show how Google promoted the State of the Union address when Obama was president but not when Trump was president. But the video was fake; Google did promote Trump's 2018 State of the Union. "We have historically not promoted the first address to Congress by a new President, which is technically not a State of the Union address. As a result, we didn’t include a promotion on google.com for this address in either 2009 or 2017," Google said in a statement.
